rukus.text: hananim-i cheonsadeul-ege illeo adam-ege buboghala hani geudeul mo duga buboghayeoss-eudoe ibeulliseuneun geuleohji anihago heulg-eulobuteo changjohan-ingan-ege buboghalan mal-iyo lago hamyeonseo geoyeoghaessdeola

geuga tto malhadeola igeos-i dangsinkkeseo nae wie eunhyeleul deohan jainyo dangsinkkeseo naleul simpan-ui nalkka ji yuyehandamyeon naneun geuui husondeul eul sosuman je-oehagoneun myeolmangke ha liyo
ittae junimkkeseo ileusini ga la geudeul jung-e neoleul ttaleuneun ja iss damyeon sillo jiog-i neohuileul wihan neomchineun bosang-i doelila

tto ileusigil nega hal su iss neun neoui yuhog-ui mogsolilo geudeul-eul myeolmang-eulo yuinhae bola neoui jason deul-eul buyuke hagessnola yagsoghae bo la satan-eun geudeul-ege yagsog-eul ihaeng chi moshago gimanhadeola
sillo neoneun naui jongdeul wie amuleon gwonneung-i eobsnani junim-ui bo hohasim-eulo chungbunhanila
neohui junim-i neohuileul wihae baelohayeo badaleul hanghaehage hani ilohayeo neohuiga geubun-ui eunhyeleul guhadolog ham-ila sillo geubun-eun neo huiege jabileul bepusyeossnola

neohuiga bada-eseo bulhaeng-eul man nal ttae geubun anin daleun geos-e guwon eul handamyeon banghwangke doelila geuleona hananim-i neohuileul yugjilo guhaess-eul ttae neohuineun dol-aseoss-euni sillo ingan eun eunhyee gamsahal jul moleudeola

neohuiga daejiwie iss-eul ttae geubunkkeseo daejiga neohuileul samkige ha ji anihal geos-ila ansimhago issneu nyo ganghan dol hoeoliga neohuiege i leuji anh-eulila ansimhago issneunyo geuttaee neohuineun neohuileul wihan boho jaleul balgyeonhaji moshalila

geubunkkeseo dubeon dasi neohuileul badalo bonaeji anhneundago ansimhaneu nyo geubun-eun neohuiege pogpung-uleul bo naeeo neohuiga bulsinhan geos-eulo neohui leul igsake halini neohuineun hananim ege daehanghal eotteon wonjojado balgyeon chi moshalila

hananim-eun adam-ui jason-ege eunhyeleul bepul-eo yugjiwa bada-eseo geudeul-eul unbanhayeo jugo geudeul-ege joh-eun yangsig-eul buyeohayeo hananim-i changjohan eotteon geosboda geudeul-eul wie dueossnola
